Function reference

Derivations for Adding Variables

All ADaMs

ADSL-specific

Derivation Functions helpful for building the ADSL dataset

derive_var_studyeye()
Derive Study Eye

BDS-specific

Derivation Functions helpful for building the BDS datasets (e.g. advs, adlb, adeg, adex)

OCCDS-specific

Derivation Functions helpful for building the OCCDS datasets (e.g. adae, adcm, admh)

derive_var_afeye()
Derive Affected Eye

Ophtha-specific

Derivation Functions helpful for building the Ophtha datasets (e.g. adoe, adbcva)

calculate_etdrs_to_logmar()
ETDRS --> LogMAR conversion
calculate_logmar_to_etdrs()
LogMAR --> ETDRS conversion
derive_var_bcvacritxfl()
Adds CRITx CRITxFL pairs to ADBCVA dataset
derive_var_bcvacritxfl_util()
Add CRITx and CRITxFL pair to ADBCVA dataset

Utility Functions

Utilities for Formatting Observations

Utilities for Dataset Checking

Utilities used within Derivation Functions

Utilities for Filtering Observations

Utilities used for Date Imputation

Utilities used for Examples and Template Scripts

Computations

Computations expect vectors as input and return a vector

Example Datasets

You can run admiral::use_ad_template() to produce additional datasets

Other Keywords

Timing

Function related to timing, e.g., deriving dates, imputing dates, converting dates, deriving duration, …

Source Specifications

Classes defining sources for derivations where variables or observations from more than one dataset are considered, e.g., like in derive_var_lstalvdt()

Pre-Defined Time-to-Event Sources

tte_source objects defined by {admiral} that can be used as input for derive_param_tte()
